trans-unit.source: Converts a predefined color name or an RGB color value to and from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將預先定義的色彩名稱或 RGB 色彩值的轉換<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The WebColorConverter class is used to convert a <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName> object to a predefined color name or an RGB color value.
trans-unit.target: WebColorConverter 類別用來將轉換<xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>預先定義的色彩名稱或 RGB 色彩值的物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is also used to convert a predefined color name or an RGB color value to a <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 它也會用來將預先定義的色彩名稱或 RGB 色彩值來轉換<xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 您應該永遠不會直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請改為使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫適當的轉換程式

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName>類別概觀。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following list contains the sixteen predefined HTML color names you can use: - Black - Blue - Cyan - Gray - Green - Lime - Magenta - Maroon - Navy - Olive - Purple - Red - Silver - Teal - White - Yellow You can also specify a custom color by using a hexadecimal number, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form `#RRGGBB`.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單包含十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱可以使用:-黑色-藍色-青色-綠色-Lime-洋紅-暗紅色-海軍-深黃色-紫色-紅色-銀級-綠-白色灰色黃色您也可以指定自訂色彩，使用前面加上井字號字元的十六進位數字 （#），在表單中`#RRGGBB`。

trans-unit.source: `RR`, `GG`, and `BB` represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: `RR``GG`，和`BB`表示十六進位值從 0 到 255 的色彩，紅色、 綠色和藍色元件分別表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value `#0000FF` represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值`#0000FF`代表藍色。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (`00`) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (`FF`) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定的最小值 (`00`) 給紅色和綠色的元件，但所指定的最大值 (`FF`) 藍色元件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebColorConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebColorConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value to the type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為轉換器的類型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，表示要轉換的物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents information about a culture such as language, calendar system, and so on.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表文化特性，例如語言、 行事曆系統等等的相關資訊。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 在這個方法未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: It is reserved for future versions of this method.
trans-unit.target: 它被保留供未來的版本，這個方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇傳入<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>這個參數。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object resulting from conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換而產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換成指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> instance that indicates the context of the object to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>執行個體，表示要轉換的物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents information about a culture such as language, calendar system, and so on.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表文化特性，例如語言、 行事曆系統等等的相關資訊。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 在這個方法未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: It is reserved for future versions of this method.
trans-unit.target: 它被保留供未來的版本，這個方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇傳入<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>這個參數。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的類型。

trans-unit.source: The object resulting from conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換而產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: destinationType is .
trans-unit.target: destinationTypeis .
